    • Method Detail

      • resetAllTheUserStats

        public void resetAllTheUserStats()
        Resets all the stats via resetAllTheUserStats. This will reset the stats like longestlengthofmessage,mostactivefollower and mostproductiveuser.

      • tweetTheMessage

        public void tweetTheMessage(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
                     throws IOException
        AfterReturning implementation for the tweet message. This will save the tweet message in the map. It will compute the length of the longest tweet, the most productive user .
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - A JoinPoint for getting details about a point in the exectuon of program.
        Throws:
        IOException - Incase the tweet method throws another exception.

      • followTheUser

        public void followTheUser(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
                   throws IOException
        AfterReturning implementation for the follow message. This will save the follow message details in the map. It will compute the most active follower.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - A JoinPoint for getting details about a point in the exectuon of program.
        Throws:
        IOException - Incase the follow method throws another exception.

      • followTheUserAfterFailure

        public void followTheUserAfterFailure(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                      Throwable error)
                               throws IOException
        AfterThrowing implementation for the follow message incase of failure. This will save the follow message details in the map. It will compute the most active follower.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - A JoinPoint for getting details about a point in the exectuon of program.
        error - The error object from the follow user method.
        Throws:
        IOException - Incase the follow method throws another exception.

      • getTheMostProductiveUser

        public void getTheMostProductiveUser()
        Before implementation for the tweet message. It will compute the most productive follower.

      • getTheMostActiveFollower

        public void getTheMostActiveFollower()
        Before implementation for the get most active follower. It will be called before the calling the tweetstatsimpl class.getTheMostActiveFollower =() function.

      • printTreeMap

        public static void printTreeMap(Map<String,Integer> aTreeMap)
